name: Dojo Storm
description:
Super Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu Dojo Storm: Championship Edition is a retro 8-Bit RPG that explores the world of Jiu-Jitsu through a humorous lens. Battle your way through Bitsburgh in turn-based combat, grow your team of jiu-jiteros, and defeat the evil plaguing the streets!

* 50+ characters to choose from, each with unique moves.
* Dozens of maps that house hundreds of NPCs!
* Turn-based combat in which strategy is paramount.
* Save your game at any time to continue later!
